open_multinetwork_instructions_page.description: Navigate to the Multinetwork Instructions page

enter_advertiser_name.description: Enter advertiser name in the search field

enter_deal_number.description: Enter deal number in the search field

enter_agency.description: Enter agency name in the search field

enter_begin_date.description: Enter begin date in the date field

enter_end_date.description: Enter end date in the date field

click_search_button.description: Click the search button to submit the search form

wait_for_search_results.description: Wait for search results to load

find_row_by_values.description: Find a row matching provided parameters and right-click on it

select_edit_multinetwork_instruction.description: Select 'Edit Multi-network Instruction' from context menu
